snippet: The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony told The New York Observer that he intended to opt out of the final year of his contract after this season.
abstract: New York Knicks star Carmelo Anthony tells New York Observer that he wants to become free agent, saying that he intends to opt out of the final year of his contract following current season.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony told The New York Observer that he intended to opt out of the final year of his contract after this season.

headline.main: Anthony Likes Idea of Becoming Free Agent
headline.print_headline: Anthony Likes Idea Of Becoming Free Agent
